author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO FORECAST TO WEAKEN OVER COLDER WATERS...
summary: ...IVO FORECAST TO WEAKEN OVER COLDER WATERS... As of 8:00 AM MST Sat Aug 09 the center of Ivo was located near 21.0, -112.7 with movement WNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO FORECAST TO WEAKEN OVER COLDER WATERS... As of 8:00 AM MST Sat Aug 09 the center of Ivo was located near 21.0, -112.7 with movement WNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
